createAlphaIcon

public static javax.swing.ImageIcon createAlphaIcon(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                                                    float alpha)
Creates a translucent imageIcon from a given icon and an alpha value.

Parameters:
icon - The source icon.
alpha - Alpha value between 0.0f and 1.0f. 1.0f means solid.
Returns:
The new created translucent icon.

isDefaultTextBackgroundDark

public static boolean isDefaultTextBackgroundDark()
Returns true if the brightness of the default text background color is lesser than 0.5f.

Returns:
True means default text background color is dark.
